name: CreedCap Asia Advisors
tag_list: investment, venture, startup, mobile, echnology, internet, capital, fund
overview:
CreedCap Asia Advisors is a Bangalore based boutique investment banking firm, founded in 2011, that provides start-ups and small & medium enterprises with financial advisory services such as Capital Syndication, Business Restructuring and Strategic Advisory with a focus on Healthcare, Consumer Services, Food & Beverage, Information Technology and Industrial related businesses.

“Creed” is of English and Latin origin, signifying belief or a system of beliefs, principles or opinions.

Our mantra: “Believe. Become. Benefit.” portrays our approach -an effort to steer the aspiring Indian Entrepreneur to Believe in his Idea, Become his Idea and to Benefit from his Idea. This progression helps us to be a guide and true companion to principle and ethically driven Indian entrepreneurs with global aspirations.
